name: CATastrophy (Hollow Dragon Games)
description:
The cats are everywhere. They're pushing things off tables, pulling clothes out of your wardrobe (how???) and generally causing a nuisance. You try your best to clean up after them but you're so so tired... how about a quick nap instead...

First game published by our team and made in 48 hours for the GMTK 2020 Game Jam with the theme "Out of Control".

All Art, Music, and Programming was done within 48 hours.
The SFX was mostly made within 48 hours. the only ones that were not was the crashing/ item breaking sound. The meows were recorded by a team member who went MIA after only giving us the meows.

Credits:
Miguel Ines - Music - soundcloud.com/miguelines
Liam Riley - Programmer

Hollow Dragon Games Members:
Stephen Luu - Programmer
Katsu Drako - Game Design, Art
Esclair - Animation
FormingCube2 - Tutorial Menu
